skybreaker.details:
Skybreaker
Type: EDENCOM Destroyer
Base Build Time: 2h
Required Skill: Industry I

Materials:
- Tritanium: 50000
- Pyerite: 13000
- Mexallon: 4000
- Isogen: 1300
- Nocxium: 320
- Zydrine: 110
- Megacyte: 55
- Tetryon Exotic Plasma: 180
- Diamond Chromatic Plating: 180
- Auto-Integrity Preservation Seal: 40
- Life Support Backup Unit: 20

EDENCOM materials come from EDENCOM loyalty point stores.
